name: Butter Chicken Burger
description: When you crave the warming & gently spiced flavours of Butter Chicken, but don’t feel like heating up your kitchen, it’s time to hit the grill and make burgers! Keep it chicken themed by using ground chicken, or switch things up and use any ground meat you’d like. You’ll flip over how easy and delicious these are!
preparation: In a large bowl, combine chicken and seasoning. Using a fork or your hands, mix until well blended. Form into four patties.
Grill, with lid closed, 5–7 min per side, or until cooked.
Tuck burgers into buns and serve with toppings, as desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, your choice, and 1 tbsp favourite Epicure Dip.

products.name: Butter Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: There’s something so enjoyable about a big plate of Butter Chicken with warm naan or rice on the side! Our version is quicker than takeout, ready in just 20 minutes in your Round Steamer, and more affordable. Each serving is around $2, and the recipe serves eight—great for a weekend family get-together.
